channel.title: The Eye of the Storm - A gay pod book
channel.description: Dante Dre, a single gay man, awakens one morning to find himself embroiled in a horror of his own doing, and yet he has no memory of having done it.
channel.itunes:subtitle: The Eye of the Storm - A gay podbook
channel.itunes:summary: Dante Dre, a single gay man, awakens one morning to find himself embroiled in a horror of his own doing, and yet he has no memory of having done it.
channel.itunes:author: Jeffrey Lynn Stoddard

image.title: The Eye of the Storm - A gay pod book
image.description: The Eye of the Storm Logo

item.title: The Eye of the Storm - Chapter 1
item.description: A sleepless night turns into a morning of mystery and fright for Dante Dre when Tyler, an overnight affair, appears to be more than Dante first thought.
item.author: therainbowchronicles@q.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Where is Tyler?
item.itunes:summary: A sleepless night turns into a morning of mystery and fright for Dante Dre when Tyler, an overnight affair, appears to be more than Dante first thought.
item.itunes:author: Jeffrey Lynn Stoddard

item.title: The Eye of the Storm - Chapter 2
item.description: Exhausted from the previous night's insomnia, Dante comes home from work to a very unpleasant welcome.
item.author: therainbowchronicles@q.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Why tonight?
item.itunes:summary: Exhausted from the previous night's insomnia, Dante comes home from work to a very unpleasant welcome.
item.itunes:author: Jeffrey Lynn Stoddard

item.title: The Eye of the Storm - Chapter 3
item.description: The dark figure in the doorway is revealed, though not being who Dante had anticipated. Worse is the news to be delivered.
item.author: therainbowchronicles@q.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Within the darkness.
item.itunes:summary: The dark figure in the doorway is revealed, though not being who Dante had anticipated. Worse is the news to be delivered.
item.itunes:author: Jeffrey Lynn Stoddard

item.title: The Eye of the Storm - Chapter 4
item.description: After discussing the evening's events with Omar, Dante is left alone with his thoughts, awakening the following morning to a nightmare.
item.author: therainbowchronicles@q.com
item.itunes:subtitle: And so it begins.
item.itunes:summary: After discussing the evening's events with Omar, Dante is left alone with his thoughts, awakening the following morning to a nightmare.
item.itunes:author: Jeffrey Lynn Stoddard

item.title: The Eye of the Storm - Chapter 5
item.description: Forced to deal with the results of his deadly actions, Dante agonizes over his next step.
item.author: therainbowchronicles@q.com
item.itunes:subtitle: A deadly decision.
item.itunes:summary: Forced to deal with the results of his deadly actions, Dante agonizes over his next step.
item.itunes:author: Jeffrey Lynn Stoddard

item.title: The Eye of the Storm - Chapter 6
item.description: As if things weren't bad enough, Dante now suddenly finds things getting so much worse.
item.author: therainbowchronicles@q.com
item.itunes:subtitle: A new extreme.
item.itunes:summary: As if things weren't bad enough, he now suddenly finds things getting so much worse.
item.itunes:author: Jeffrey Lynn Stoddard

item.title: The Eye of the Storm - Chapter 7
item.description: As if things weren't bad enough, Dante now suddenly finds things getting so much worse.
item.author: therainbowchronicles@q.com
item.itunes:subtitle: The ugly truth.
item.itunes:summary: The truth of not only Dante's captor but of his intentions is revealed in the dark basement.
item.itunes:author: Jeffrey Lynn Stoddard

item.title: The Eye of the Storm - Chapter 8
item.description: Dante awakens to find that, not only is his captor not to be what he suspected, but another victim has been added to the mix.
item.author: therainbowchronicles@q.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Masking the facts.
item.itunes:summary: Dante awakens to find that, not only is his captor not to be what he suspected, but another victim has been added to the mix.
item.itunes:author: Jeffrey Lynn Stoddard

item.title: The Eye of the Storm - Chapter 9
item.description: The full brunt of Leonard's wrath is realized as the threat of the knife becomes a harsh reality.
item.author: therainbowchronicles@q.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Time runs out.
item.itunes:summary: The full brunt of Leonard's wrath is realized as the threat of the knife becomes a harsh reality.
item.itunes:author: Jeffrey Lynn Stoddard

item.title: The Eye of the Storm - Chapter 10
item.description: Dante manages to get out of the basement, but what awaits him in the house is anything but hopeful.
item.author: therainbowchronicles@q.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Abandoned or trapped?
item.itunes:summary: Dante manages to get out of the basement, but what awaits him in the house is anything but hopeful.
item.itunes:author: Jeffrey Lynn Stoddard

item.title: The Eye of the Storm - Chapter 11
item.description: Dante attempts to fight back, although this is not without its pain or consequences.
item.author: therainbowchronicles@q.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Striking back
item.itunes:summary: Dante attempts to fight back, although this is not without its pain or consequences.
item.itunes:author: Jeffrey Lynn Stoddard

item.title: The Eye of the Storm - Chapter 12
item.description: Recuperating from the fall down the stairs, Dante discovers that he has something even more painful in store for him.
item.author: therainbowchronicles@q.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Revenge
item.itunes:summary: Recuperating from the fall down the stairs, Dante discovers that he has something even more painful in store for him.
item.itunes:author: Jeffrey Lynn Stoddard

item.title: The Eye of the Storm - Chapter 13
item.description: Recuperating from the fall down the stairs, Dante discovers that he has something even more painful in store for him.
item.author: therainbowchronicles@q.com
item.itunes:subtitle: The accomplice
item.itunes:summary: As the wall grows, so, too, do Dante's chances of not surviving. It is the revelation of an unexpected element, however, that proves to be even more painful.
item.itunes:author: Jeffrey Lynn Stoddard

item.title: The Eye of the Storm - Chapter 14
item.description: Dante watches in terror as the final bricks of the wall in which he is to be forever imprisoned are put into place. Can this actually be the ending that he had dreaded?
item.author: therainbowchronicles@q.com
item.itunes:subtitle: The end?
item.itunes:summary: Dante watches in terror as the final bricks of the wall in which he is to be forever imprisoned are put into place. Can this actually be the ending that he had dreaded?
item.itunes:author: Jeffrey Lynn Stoddard
